org.ecoinformatics.seek.querybuilder

Interface DBWhereIFace

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBWhereCondition, DBWhereListCellBase, DBWhereOperator

    public interface DBWhereIFace
    Interface class that enables the manipulation of either operators or conditions
